alert.note: Alert for Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Brevard County through 600 PM EDT... At 522 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grant-Valkaria, or near Malabar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Malabar, Indialantic and Melbourne Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
